Ensure the production UI aligns with your design
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Find and fix UI bugs. visually inspect element, make and save real-time CSS edits, and share the revised CSS with developers.

Main features:
-----------------------
Inspect elements:
Click on any element to check its CSS properties, such as colors, text, spacing, display, borders, and more. Draw guides and identify colors using the eyedropper tool.

Measure distances:
Measure the distances between elements on your web page, including both outer and inner spacing. Select an element, and validate its proximity to others. Perfect for precise layout adjustments and layout optimization.

Visual CSS editing:
Edit and update element properties directly in the browser using a visual CSS editor, like in other design tools you're already familiar with, including: display, size, spacing, colors, typography, border, radius, position, box-shadow and opacity.

Pixel perfect comparison:
Upload or copy and paste the original design mockup from Figma as an image overlay. This feature provides pixel-perfect accuracy by comparing the live web page with the original design.

Page overview:
A summary of your page colors and fonts.
The colors are grouped by types: background colors, text colors, border colors and fill colors.
The fonts are grouped by the different font families, font size, font weight, and line height. 

Export CSS:
After adjustments are made, export and share the relevant CSS changes with your developers.
You can export all changes in one stylesheet, or copy paste each CSS snippet and quickly share it anywhere.
